files.patch: @@ -402,1 +402,0 @@ - * @@ -494,2 +493,1 @@ - * Actions in a thread prior to calling - * {@code enqueue} successfully + * Actions in a thread prior to a successful call to {@code enqueue} @@ -498,2 +496,2 @@ - * or {@link ReferenceQueue#remove}. Unsuccessful - * {@code enqueue} calls have no specified memory consistency effects. + * or {@link ReferenceQueue#remove}. Unsuccessful calls to + * {@code enqueue} have no specified memory consistency effects.

@@ -127,1 +127,0 @@ - * @@ -145,2 +144,2 @@ - *
  • An object is strongly reachable if it can be accessed without - * traversing the referent of a Reference object. + *
  • An object is strongly reachable if it is reachable and if it + * can be accessed without traversing the referent of a Reference object.
